name: Black Ball 2
description:
If the game does not respond to anything when starting click the window with the game.

Use WASD to move and z and x for a and b. To start and select things in text use z.

This game was made in GB Studio. This is a puzzle game and is not hard. You do have to think about what the people say though. Try to remember and think about what they are saying.

GB Studio is a game engine that makes Game Boy games. It is a visual scripting game engine and not hard to use.
